title: Spoofing Attack Detection in the Physical Layer with Robustness to User Movement. (arXiv:2310.11043v1 [eess.SP])
abstract: In a spoofing attack, an attacker impersonates a legitimate user to access or modify data belonging to the latter. Typical approaches for spoofing detection in the physical layer declare an attack when a change is observed in certain channel features, such as the received signal strength (RSS) measured by spatially distributed receivers. However, since channels change over time, for example due to user movement, such approaches are impractical. To sidestep this limitation, this paper proposes a scheme that combines the decisions of a position-change detector based on a deep neural network to distinguish spoofing from movement. Building upon community detection on graphs, the sequence of received frames is partitioned into subsequences to detect concurrent transmissions from distinct locations. translated_title: 物理层中对抗用户移动具有鲁棒性的欺骗攻击检测
translated_abstract: 在欺骗攻击中，攻击者冒充合法用户以访问或修改后者的数据。传统的物理层欺骗检测方法在观察到某些信道特征的变化时宣布攻击，例如空间分布的接收器测量到的接收信号强度（RSS）。然而，由于信道随时间变化，例如由于用户移动，这些方法是不实际的。为了规避这个限制，本文提出了一种方案，该方案结合了基于深度神经网络的位置变化检测器的决策，以区分欺骗攻击和移动。在图上基于社区检测的基础上，将接收到的帧序列划分为子序列，以检测来自不同位置的同时传输。该方案可以在实践中轻松部署，因为它仅涉及在几十个位置收集少量测量数据，甚至不需要计算或记录。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种物理层欺骗攻击检测方案，具有鲁棒性，可以区分欺骗攻击和用户移动，并且可以在实践中轻松部署。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a robust spoofing attack detection scheme in the physical layer, which can distinguish spoofing attacks from user movement, and can be easily deployed in practice.
